controller_view

Class PlayAnMP3

  • Object
    • PlayAnMP3

  • public class PlayAnMP3
extends Object
    This program is initialized inside of a javafx application. It simulates a mp3 player and plays any songs that have been added to the queue in FIFO order. Notably, the setOnEndOfMedia method for the MediaPlayer is not functioning correctly so another thread is used to check the duration of each song to manually stop each song. We are also looking into using the autoplay method.
    Author:
    David Wang adapter from code proved by Rick Mercer
